meta.title: iTrade - Intelligent & Strategic Crypto Trading
meta.description: Trade smarter with AI-powered strategies across multiple exchanges. Real-time analytics, automated execution, and risk management built for professionals.

hero.title: Markets thrive on <emphasis>chaos</emphasis>
hero.subtitle: For the bold, chaos isn't a downfall ‚Äî it's a <emphasis>ladder to rise</emphasis>
hero.description: Trade smarter with AI-powered strategies across multiple exchanges. Real-time analytics, automated execution, and risk management built for professionals.

features.multiExchangeDescription: Trade on Binance, OKX, and Coinbase from one platform
features.realTimeDescription: Live market data and instant order execution
features.riskDescription: Built-in stop-loss, position sizing, and portfolio tracking

mobile.title: Download iTrade <accent>Mobile App</accent>
mobile.description: Take control of your crypto portfolio anywhere, anytime. Real-time market data, instant order execution, and advanced trading tools at your fingertips.

footer.risk: Trade responsibly. Cryptocurrency trading involves risk.

auth.terms: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

signUp.subtitle: Welcome to iTrade world. Already have an account, back to

messages.verifyEmail: A verification email has been sent to your email address, please check your email to verify your account.

forgetPassword.title: Send Reset Password Link
forgetPassword.description: Please input your register email address, we will send a reset password link to your email. Back to

sent.line1: We sent a password reset link to {email}.
sent.line2: Please check your inbox and click the link to reset your password.

messages.success: Reset password successfully, please sign in.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: This action cannot be undone. Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted.

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: Please make sure you want to delete your account. All your data, including strategies, trades, and portfolios will be permanently removed.

deleteAccount.passwordHint: We need to verify your identity before sending the verification code

verify.description: A verification code has been sent to {email}. Please check your inbox and enter the code below.

success.title: Account Deleted
success.description: Your account has been successfully deleted.

success.redirect: Redirecting to home page in 3 seconds...

messages.codeSent: Verification code sent to your email

errors.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.nameMax: Name must be less than 50 characters

security.title: Change Password
security.description: Update your password to keep your account secure. We recommend using a strong, unique password.

requirements.title: Password requirements:
requirements.uppercase: Contains at least one uppercase letter (A-Z)
requirements.lowercase: Contains at least one lowercase letter (a-z)

errors.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.number: Password must contain at least one number

email.title: Email Preferences
email.description: Choose which emails you would like to receive. You can update these settings at any time.

danger.description: Actions in this section are irreversible. Please proceed with caution.

warning.description: The actions below can result in permanent data loss. Please make sure you understand the consequences before proceeding.

deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This includes all your strategies, trades, portfolios, and settings.

meta.title: Market
meta.description: Real-time perpetual futures market data, funding rates, and price movements

funding.title: Funding Rates
funding.tooltip: Funding rates are periodic payments between long and short traders. Positive rates mean longs pay shorts, negative rates mean shorts pay longs.
